messageHow: Try combining solid shapes with shapes with dots on. Also try square patterned shapes with diagonal patterned shapes.
messageRules:
Solid shapes combine with dotty shapes. 
Square patterned shapes combine with diagonal patterned shapes.

messageHow: Shapes that contain stripes seem to be able to be paired with shapes that contain squares. Try holding on to the combined shape. If it contains stripes, pick up a different shape that contains squares and vice-versa until this stops working.
messageRules: Shapes containing stripes paired with different shapes containing squares. Whichever pattern within the shape was picked up last, would be the pattern taken on by the new combined crystal.

messageRules: checked red triangle and solid red diamond makes orange triangle...orange triangle and checked diamond makes lime triangle....checked red diamond and orange triangle makes lime diamond.....dotted red triangle and striped red diamond makes striped orange triangle....combine this with lime diamond gets green triangle
